reviews.review: Me dejo la mina con la que tenía onda, pero me pase este juego ya no me importa nada aguante matar headcrabs con inodoros.

Крутая игра, графика на высшем уровне даже сейчас имеет место быть,выдает 250 фпс на моей тарахтелке!
Сюжет очень интересен (продожение half life ) , игра немного головоломка, поэтому вам предется немного пошевелить мозгами. В этой игре предстоит сражаться с военной армией и с мутантами ( зомби ).
Ставлю ей 9,5/10 !

It's a classic, it still holds up like crazy. You're not allowed to dislike hl2. I mean you could. But should you?

A true classic, this game is excellent even where it's cliched. It manages to make even the token "scary zombie level" amazing. I paid 22 Canadian dollars for Half Life 2, episode 1, episode 2, deathmatch, lost coast, etc. It's well worth the money. The game also runs very well considering I'm running Windows 10, and it was designed to run on Windows XP.
me gusto mucho y esta muy bueno gracias

As with the first game first saw this when shown by friend, first played it myself on Xbox as did not have at time of release either the internet or capable PC. Later on did play it and the episodes on PC where they began and belong. This is a perfect example of what a sequel should be, more of the same but expanded upon and taken further and with greater technology behind it. Continues the story and though giving closure on the events of the first game also brings up new questions to be answered, when played consecutively with its episodes is a thoroughly enjoyable and rewarding experience in both interactivity and narrative.

Лучшая, до сих пор непревзойденная игра, в которой сочетается все: великолепная атмосфера, революционный геймплей, захватывающий сценарий, по-настоящему живые герои! Half-life 2 - игра-феномен, игра на все времена!
заебись игра было лучше и нету

Half-Life 2 is my all time favourite game.

The world that it puts you in is incredibly immersive. You can almost smell and feel the vibe of the city. You really feel like a traveller going through the inner depths of the city, not some fluffed up story line with un-explainable transitions. You walk, run and drive through the world that you are in. There is no clues in this world, just your own common sense guides you. It is amazing. I've never felt to captivated by a world in a game. The canals really feel like somewhere I've been before, deep into the grimy empty industrial parts of a city.

11/10 best game ever
